IN THE FUTURE the future will be eternal, always one step ahead, never quite in reach but always leading you on.

IN THE FUTURE all will be well all of the time, and though you'll suspect foul play, you'll never be able to prove a thing.
IN THE FUTURE true love will be so rare that it will be sold to collectors for immeasurable sums.
IN THE FUTURE no one will understand you. At least not the way you want them to.
IN THE FUTURE you will understand things on levels of complexity that transcend all knowledge we can express today.
IN THE FUTURE you won't have to look far to find it, and when you do. you'll know how profound it is.
IN THE FUTURE we will be able to express the most complex of emotions through a series of short staccato sounds.
IN THE FUTURE it will be hot all of the time and we will value our time in the currency of ice cubes.
IN THE FUTURE each of us will create our own personal vocabulary that no one else will share, and through this truly explore loneliness.
IN TEH FUTURE we will be wrong.
IN THE FUTURE we will be strong.
IN THE FUTURE we will be driven to great destiny, and in destiny know we played very little hand in our series of chance progressions.
IN THE FUTURE you will know me and I will know you but we will have lost touch with ourselves and the knowledge will be of little value.
IN THE FUTURE we will have a nerve wrenching constant of anxiety and pain, for a price.
